sub_title: Senior Portfolio Manager Infrastructure at APG Asset Management
summary: Investment Manager in the private equity infrastructure field with ~8y experience in the origination, execution and asset management of direct investments in multiple sectors (energy, transportation, telecom, social infrastructure) and various geographies (France, Spain, Portugal, Sweden, UK). Previous experience in M&A, with solid knowledge in finance & business (Banking, Finance and Insurance Master from Dauphine, MBA from Washington University), quadrilingual (French, English, Portuguese, Spanish)
